column4: Yeah, so I burned a Windows XP MCE DVD... I put it in, hoping I could reformat my MBR or something. It would only let me reinstall Windows, which I don't want to do. Now guess what... GRUB is completely GONE. All my computer does when I boot it is post, and then reboot. It's a fscking infinite loop!
Ubuntu SUICIDE bombed Windows XP!!! Now there's NOTHING on my computer.
My computer is effing DEAD because of Ubuntu. What garbage.
